img_summary: The image depicts a wooden tray containing several reddish-brown seeds, likely representing an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, it is part of a list detailing collectible seeds within the game, each with unique rarity and acquisition methods. The seeds shown in this image are likely "Fire Date Seeds," categorized as rare and obtained by collecting Fire Dates. The image serves to visually represent this specific item for players.
